mapper.update:
update KQDS_RECEIVEINFO
createuser = #{createuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
usercode = #{usercode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
deptno = #{deptno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
regno = #{regno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
recesort = #{recesort,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
askperson = #{askperson,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
detaildesc = #{detaildesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
failreason1 = #{failreason1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
askstatus = #{askstatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
organization = #{organization,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DEV_ITEM = #{devItem,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
doctors = #{doctors,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
main_suit = #{mainSuit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
scheme = #{scheme,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
price = #{price,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
order_project = #{orderProject,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
order_plan = #{orderPlan,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
follow = #{follow,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
failreason_mark = #{failreasonMark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
othe_rmark = #{othermark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where SEQ_ID = #{seqId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update KQDS_RECEIVEINFO set createuser = #{createuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, usercode = #{usercode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, deptno = #{deptno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, regno = #{regno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, recesort = #{recesort,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, askperson = #{askperson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, detaildesc = #{detaildesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, failreason1 = #{failreason1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, askstatus = #{askstatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, organization = #{organization,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEV_ITEM = #{devItem,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where SEQ_ID = #{seqId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select count(1) from KQDS_RECEIVEINFO where regno = #{_parameter} and askstatus = 1
select seq_id from KQDS_RECEIVEINFO where 1=1 and usercode in (${_parameter})

select i.regno, kcit4.dict_name as failreason1, kcit5.dict_name as devitemdesc from KQDS_RECEIVEINFO i LEFT JOIN SYS_DICT kcit4 on i.failreason1 = kcit4.seq_id LEFT JOIN SYS_DICT kcit5 on i.dev_item = kcit5.seq_id where i.regno in (${seqid})
